column5: So far so good. Only four more weeks of Winter Come on in. New Day Cafe is one of our DailyKos openthreads posting at 07:30 Portland Standard Time. If you have a question or something to say don’t be bashful. Sign up here. Our Rules of the Road are here. I’m thinking about buying a new camera. ​ ​Time for pie breakfast.  What’s on your mind this morning? We were all new here once so don’t be bashful.
